translation.en: ♪ Just a splash of skin ♪ ♪ The brief relief ♪
♪ Heavy days ♪ ♪ But I'm holding onto the beauty I see ♪
[Yusef] I think a portrait can be very strong,
especially if you consider the person that you're looking at it.

-Nice to meet you. -Very nice to meet you.
Can you, uh, excuse me for a moment?
So, um, are we gonna-- are we gonna discuss that?
-Stop. Stop. Stop. -[Yusef] You're looking at her

저 아가씨 한번 그려 보고 싶은 거지?
전시작이 아주 굉장해요 대단하네요 체나이, 아이제이아 맥스웰이에요

translation.en: -Ah. -Pleasure to meet you. Mr. Davis, we're ready.
He wanted to paint over this.
[Chenai] It's pure joy to watch the progression

translation.en: of an artist through the labor of several bodies of work.

translation.en: Now, if you want representation and a possible solo show,
now you're going to have to commit yourself 100% to the work.
-Solo show? -I'm having a group show here

내가 몇 달 후에 여기서 그룹 전시회를 열어요

-How you? -Hmm. I'm good -How are you? -I'm coolin'.

Looking for something. Nah, I'm kidding.

뭐 좀 찾는 게 있긴 하지만… 농담이야 그래, 네 친구는 아직 안 왔어?

-This shit poppin'. -I know, thank you. Thank you.

translation.en: Here they go. Here they go. -Break that shit up. -Don't be mad, -don't be jealous. -Break that shit up.

I'm so glad you made it.

translation.en: -I want this. -You look nice. Want that purse, shoes, everything.

-[Stevie] You look good. -You ready to party tonight?

I haven't been out in a minute, so a little stiff.

매리언 배리 청소년 여름 캠프 때부터

translation.en: Nice turn out. Yeah, it's pretty crowded, isn't it?
-Nick's a good guy. -[Nick] Um, okay. Okay.
Okay. So, uh, to right now.

translation.en: [man] Check, check one, two. Yo, yo. How y'all doing tonight?
translation.ko: 마이크 테스트, 하나, 둘 여러분, 안녕하세요?

translation.en: Oh, come on, Get Down-- y'all can make more noise than that. How are y'all doing tonight?

translation.en: [Nick] So if you don't know, uh, my name is Nick and I'm the owner of this here establishment
-and this is the Get Down. -I'm gonna--
Oh, okay. See you in a bit.

translation.ko: 워싱턴 DC 예전 느낌을 되살리고 싶어서 이렇게…
워싱턴 DC 예전 느낌을 되살리고 싶어서 이렇게… 고고 잘 춰요?

translation.en: Yo, TOB, crank that shit, man.
Shit, I mean, we're all artists as far as I'm concerned.

translation.ko: 하필 난 그림을 그리게 된 것뿐이죠

translation.en: I don't have an artistic bone in my body.
Eh, I find that hard to believe.
Folk make you feel like art supposed to be
some lofty shit but, Black people
translation.ko: 예술이 고상한 거라고들 하지만… 흑인은 매일 무에서 유를 창조하잖아요

translation.en: create shit out of nothing every day.
And if that ain't art, then, I don't know what is.
translation.ko: 그게 예술이 아니라면 대체 뭐가 예술이겠어요?

translation.en: -Come on, man, you know. -[laughs] -Like, what do you do? -Okay.
translation.ko: 아, 그러지 말고… 스티비는 하는 일이 뭐예요?

translation.en: Okay well, I just, um, transferred to Georgetown Law.
translation.ko: 이제 막 조지타운 대학교 로스쿨에 진학했어요

translation.en: So, how did you get a name like Stevie?
She named me after Stevie Wonder.
Yeah, my mom saw him in concert in Rotterdam
translation.ko: 맞아요, 엄마가 로테르담에서 스티비 원더 콘서트를 봤는데

translation.en: when she was eight months pregnant with me.
She said I was so excited that I danced the entire time.
translation.ko: 엄마 얘기로는 뱃속에서 내가 계속 신나게 춤을 췄다네요

translation.en: My folks just picked their favorite name out the Bible and, uh, you know…
translation.ko: 우리 부모님은 내 이름 그냥 성서에서 따온 건데

translation.en: Yeah. I lived there until I was 16.
translation.ko: 네, 열여섯 살 때까지 거기 살았어요
그랬군요 하지만 우리 부모님, 조부모님 일가친척 모두 DC 출신이거든요

translation.en: my grandparents, my whole family, everyone's from DC.
translation.ko: 하지만 우리 부모님, 조부모님 일가친척 모두 DC 출신이거든요
워싱턴 DC, 아니면 PG 카운티요? - 워싱턴 DC요 - 장난친 거예요

translation.en: Look I'm just asking, you know, people try and lump DC
translation.ko: - 워싱턴 DC요 - 장난친 거예요 DC랑 메릴랜드랑 버지니아를 한데 묶으려는 사람들이 많잖아요

translation.en: and Maryland and Virginia all together but, you know.
translation.ko: DC랑 메릴랜드랑 버지니아를 한데 묶으려는 사람들이 많잖아요 알죠?

translation.en: I know you're busy with law school and everything
but, if you ever wanna pause for a moment…
translation.ko: 잠깐 쉬고 싶거나 뭐, 그럴 때가 생기면

translation.en: maybe we could do this again.
[Claudette] But I like the design though.
The design was really nice. Yes.
[Mr. Maxwell] Reverend Raleigh put his foot in that sermon
translation.ko: - 주님, 자비를 베푸소서 - 주변이 하나도 안 보였어 오늘 아침 라일리 목사님 설교는 아주 좋았어

translation.en: -this morning, didn't he? -I would've enjoyed it more
translation.ko: 오늘 아침 라일리 목사님 설교는 아주 좋았어 헬렌이 쓴 모자가 시야를 가리지 않았으면 더 좋았겠죠

translation.en: if Helen's hat wasn't in the way.
translation.ko: 헬렌이 쓴 모자가 시야를 가리지 않았으면 더 좋았겠죠

translation.en: Can't go one day without talking 'bout folk?
translation.ko: 거, 하루라도 남 얘기 좀 안 할 수 없나?

translation.en: Oh, hush. I wasn't talking about her. I was talking about her hat.
translation.ko: 남 얘기가 아니라 모자 얘기죠 헬렌이 쓴 모자 말이에요

translation.en: [Mr. Maxwell] Junior, you apply for that job yet, son?
translation.ko: 어이, 아들 거기에 취업 원서는 냈냐?

translation.en: -What job? -[Claudette] You know, the one that Deacon Johnson recommended.
translation.ko: - 어디요? - 거기, 존슨 집사님이 추천한 데

translation.en: Thought I said I wasn't applying.
translation.ko: 그거 지원 안 할 거라고 말씀드린 것 같은데요

translation.en: Junior, are you still selling sperm?
translation.ko: 우리 형제님 혹시 아직도 정자 팔아?
그때 딱 한 번 그런 거야, 클로뎃

translation.en: [Mrs. Maxwell] The deacon says that job pays real good, Isaiah.
translation.ko: 집사님 얘기로는 그 자리 보수가 좋다더라, 아이제이아

translation.en: You could finally start tithing, find a nice apartment.
translation.ko: 너도 이제 십일조 내고 좋은 아파트도 구해야지

translation.en: [Mr. Maxwell] I'm still trying to figure out how you're gonna support a family with these paintings.
translation.ko: 난 여전히 의문이다, 그림을 그려서 가족을 부양하겠다니

translation.en: That ain't no real job. -What family, pops? -[Claudette] I mean, Dad,
translation.ko: - 그런 건 직업이 아니야 - 무슨 가족요?

translation.en: -can you let him get a woman first? -I…
Let me find out you like being broke.
Hey. I love that you're here.
I mean, you're giving me all this free coffee.
translation.ko: 네 덕분에 공짜 커피 얻어 마시는 건 나잖아

translation.en: [Mecca] Well, listen though, I'm taking donations. -You could always… -Not today, boo.

translation.ko: - 오늘은 안 돼 - 안 돼? - 옷 예쁘네 - 와, 단호하구나, 알았어

translation.en: Is this from the same farm… or, a different one?
translation.ko: 이거, 같은 농장 제품이야? 아니면 다른 데 거야?

translation.en: This is actually from a different farm.
It's one of the oldest coffee beans still produced in Ethiopia.
translation.ko: 에티오피아에서 가장 오래된 커피 농장에서 생산된 거지

translation.en: So tell me, what--what's going on? What are you working on?
translation.ko: 그나저나 얘기 좀 해 봐 지금 하는 일은 어떤 거야?

translation.en: I mean, it's like I enjoy what I'm doing at the firm.
translation.ko: 그러니까 그게 로펌 일이 즐겁긴 하지만

translation.en: if I wanna be this big shot lawyer -at a big firm, you know. -[Mecca] Mm-hmm.
translation.ko: 대형 로펌에서 잘나가는 변호사가 되는 게 정말 내가 원하는 일일까?

translation.en: And my dad thinks that those big firms will give me the leverage I'll need later.
translation.ko: 아빠는 대형 로펌에서 일한 경력이 나중에 나한테 큰 도움이 될 거래

translation.en: I am literally my parents' worst nightmare.
I've got multiple degrees to pour people's coffee.
translation.ko: 날 봐, 내가 학위가 몇 갠데 여기서 커피나 서빙하고 있잖아

translation.en: Yes, I am. You're right. I am. I'm doing it.
translation.ko: 그래, 맞아 내가 좋아서 하는 게 맞지

translation.en: You know, I saw the way -Isaiah was looking at you. -Girl, stop.
translation.ko: 있잖아, 아이제이아가 너를 보는 눈길이 아주…

translation.en: I don't--I don't have time -for much of anything right now. -[Mecca] Okay.
translation.ko: 그만해, 나 요즘 시간 없어서 아무것도 못 하는 거 알잖아

translation.en: Look at how I'm spending my weekends.
translation.ko: - 그래 - 내가 주말에 뭐 하는지 좀 봐

translation.en: He asked me on a date.
I mean, it's just a date.
translation.ko: 그냥 데이트 한번 하는 거지, 뭐

translation.en: -[Mecca] We'll see what… -Stop. Don't do that.
That's--I didn't-- I didn't do anything. That's…
translation.ko: - 그러지 마 - 나 아무것도 안 했는데?

translation.en: Be careful. This is my mortgage for the next year.
translation.ko: 조심해, 나중에 이걸로 주택 융자금 갚을 거니까

translation.en: Yo, you finished that fucker for the show yet?
translation.ko: 그 전시회에 낼 거라던 그림은 다 완성했어?

translation.en: Your ass need to get inspired.
Hey, tell me where you get it from.
Well, it depends on the piece.
You know, it's been a bit of everything, you know,
translation.ko: 뭐랄까, 주변 모든 것들로부터 조금씩은 다 영감을 받아

translation.en: from uh women to motherfuckers on the corner, to Cuban architecture
translation.ko: 가령 여자라든가 뒷골목 깡패, 쿠바 건축물

translation.en: to watching ducks in the park.
You know, the best shit come from living.
You know, you can't be holed up in a dark-ass room all day
translation.ko: 온종일 어두운 방 안에 있으면서 영감을 주는 뮤즈가

translation.en: and expect the motherfucking muse to just show up for free.
No, she a hungry bitch and she need to be fed that good shit.
translation.ko: 뮤즈는 굶주린 계집애야 잘 먹이면서 길러야 해

translation.en: Now, look, what your ass need to do,
translation.ko: 어이, 친구 너한테 필요한 건 말이지

translation.en: is separate your studio from your living space.
translation.ko: 작업 스튜디오와 생활 공간을 분리하는 거야

translation.en: That's when you're gonna become the artist you wanna be.
translation.ko: 그래야 네가 진정 바라는 화가가 될 수 있어

translation.en: So you preaching now? Hey, call it what you want.
translation.ko: - 지금 나한테 설교하는 거냐? - 설교든 뭐든 상관없어

translation.en: If you don't learn shit else from me,
translation.ko: 네가 나한테서 배운 게 하나도 없다고 해도

translation.en: always remember to keep at least one piece for yourself from every show.
translation.ko: 이건 명심해, 전시회 열 때마다 적어도 한 작품은 꼭 네가 소장해

translation.en: Because motherfucker, you got to own your own shit.
translation.ko: 네 녀석 그림이니까 너도 가지고 있어야지

translation.en: I ain't think about it like that.
[Stevie] A recent report by the DC Fair Housing Institute
translation.ko: DC 주택 공사의 최근 보고서에 따르면

translation.en: reveals that housing costs are often between 50% and 80% of the income
who are almost completely Black and Latino.
The current housing protection laws are flawed
and no longer serve the people they were intended to protect.
translation.ko: 원래 보호하고자 했던 이들을 더는 보호하지 못하는 실정입니다

translation.en: I'm not sure this is a civil rights issue.
translation.ko: 그게 왜 인권 문제인지 명확하지 않습니다

translation.en: Can you actually prove patterns of discrimination?
translation.ko: 차별로 인해 발생한 문제라는 걸 증명할 수 있습니까?

translation.en: What's happening in DC right now
translation.ko: 현재 DC의 문제는 이 나라에서 대대로 이어져 온

translation.en: is the result of legacy housing discrimination in this country.
translation.ko: 주택 상속의 차별로 인해 야기된 것입니다

translation.en: It's exactly one of the reasons why the Fair Housing Act of 1968
translation.ko: 이 문제를 해결하고자 1968년에 공평 주거 권리 법이

translation.en: was enacted in the first place.
While the discrimination may not be blatantly based on race,
translation.ko: 그 덕분에 노골적인 인종 차별이 수면 위로 드러나지 않았을 뿐

translation.en: which is, again, in this country, tied to race.
translation.ko: 이 나라의 경제 체제 안으로 이동, 흡수됐습니다

translation.en: Quite the setup you got here.
You know? I like to spoil the ladies.
-Hmm. Do you now? -Hold on, hold on. More wine?
-Uh-hmm. -I got you. Yes, please. Oh, hold on. Wait.
translation.ko: - 여기 있어 - 응, 더 줘, 잠깐만

translation.en: [Isaiah] I love it out here right now.
translation.ko: 이렇게 여기 나와 있는 거 정말 좋다

translation.en: It's like the perfect time. [Stevie] It's beautiful.
[Stevie] So this is where all the magic happens.
I mean, I guess you could say that.
I actually just picked that one up from my mom's house.
translation.ko: 그건 엄마 집에서 가져온 건데 아직 마무리를 못 했어
그건 엄마 집에서 가져온 건데 아직 마무리를 못 했어 "이발소"

translation.en: [Isaiah] No. I still need to fill in
some details on his shirt, background.
translation.ko: 응, 셔츠 디테일도 살려야 하고 배경도 채워 넣어야지

translation.en: I haven't shown anybody that one yet.
translation.ko: 아직 아무에게도 안 보여 준 건데

translation.en: Kind of reminds me of Noah Davis's work.
That's one of my favorite artists.
-Wow. -He always talks about spirituality being the driving force behind his paintings
translation.ko: 노아는 언제나 그림의 원동력이 영성이라고 했지

translation.en: and how uncomfortable it makes people.
translation.ko: 그게 사람들 기분을 불편하게 만든다고 말이야

translation.en: Now if my work could even come remotely close to evoking that kind of conversation,
translation.ko: 만약 내 그림이 아주 조금이라도 그런 대화를 자아낼 수 있다면

translation.en: So how do you know when a painting is finished?
How do you know when you're making love to someone?
[Stevie] Hey. I just received a package with a painting.
translation.ko: 있지, 내가 조금 전에 그림을 하나 선물 받았는데

translation.en: Would you know anything about that? There's no return address.
translation.ko: 혹시 뭐 아는 거 있어? 보내는 사람 주소가 없더라

translation.en: You got admirers sending you art, huh?
translation.ko: 너 따라다니는 남자가 예술품도 선물해주고 말이야

translation.en: I might need to step my game up. Mmm, I think your game is pretty strong.
translation.ko: - 나도 더 적극적으로 임해야겠어 - 충분히 잘하고 있어

translation.en: Will you come hang it for me?
So where do you want me to put it?
All depends how you wanna interact with it,
translation.ko: 네가 어떤 방식으로 이 그림과 소통하고 싶은지에 따라 달라

translation.en: want it to put a smile on your face when you walk in the door,
translation.ko: 문 열고 들어오면서 미소 짓고 싶어?
아니면 뭔가 떠올리고 싶은데 그게 바로…

translation.en: How about this spot right here?
-Uh-hmm. -Hold on, hold on. Nah, nah, nah. No. No. No.
Yo, I've known Young for God knows how long, right?
translation.ko: 아니, 내가 저 녀석을 알고 지낸 세월이 얼만데

translation.en: He's never cleaned a crab for nobody, not even his mother.
translation.ko: 절대 자기 엄마한테도 게살을 발라 주는 놈이 아냐

translation.en: See, she used to eating crab cake, so you know, I have to help her out.
translation.ko: 스티비는 게살 케이크에 더 익숙하니까 내가 도와야지

translation.en: That's not true. That's not true.
translation.ko: - 아니, 그런 건 아니야 - 게는 암컷이 더 달아

translation.en: The female crabs taste sweeter. That's facts.
translation.ko: - 아니, 그런 건 아니야 - 게는 암컷이 더 달아 - 사실이잖아 - 사실이지

translation.en: That makes sense though, right? Because women are just better in general.
translation.ko: 당연해, 여자가 더 우월하니까 그게 말이 되지

translation.en: -Ah, shit. Here we go. -Thank you. Thank you.
-Here we go. I ain't say all that. -It's true.
I mean, truthfully speaking, if we are speaking truthfully…
translation.ko: 솔직히 우리가 솔직하게 말해도 그렇긴 해

translation.en: -Yes. Of course. -Uh-huh. …you know, women are better.
translation.ko: - 그래, 당연하지 - 맞아, 여자가 더 나아

translation.en: Come on, bro. Why are you trying to show me up? -Come on-- -[Stevie] See I like him.
translation.ko: - 사랑 좀 받자는데 네가 왜 나서? - 이래서 닉이 좋다니까

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay. Yeah. Yeah, I got it. Got it.
Why are we painting the living room again?
Because your mother watches too much HGTV.
translation.ko: 너희 엄마가 텔레비전을 너무 많이 보거든

translation.en: Hey, how is that job search going anyway?
I'm actually about to get representation soon.
Means I'm gonna have somebody to sell my work.
translation.ko: 다른 사람에게 내 작품을 팔겠단 얘기죠

translation.en: Probably get a solo show, too, soon.
translation.ko: 단독 전시회도 열릴 거 같고 그러니까…

translation.en: Well, it's good to see you again. -You're looking great. -I love that. Stop.
translation.ko: - 또 보니까 좋다 - 오늘도 예쁘네, 맘에 들어

translation.en: -Thank you for coming. -Of course. Of course.
Young, this is a fucking masterpiece.
Yo. You're about to blow up.
Okay. Isaiah, Stevie, come on. -Smile. -[Isaiah] All right.
translation.ko: - 아이제이아, 스티비, 둘 다 웃어 - 그래

translation.en: Hey, let's get one by the banner.
translation.ko: 야, 이름 박힌 것도 하나 찍어야지

translation.en: -Yeah. -Okay. -I like… -[Isaiah] All right. All right, all right.
-Look at that. Look at that. -There it is…
-Thank you so much. -You having fun? I'm having a lot of fun. How about you?

translation.ko: - 애덤, 여긴 웬일이야? - 잘 지내지? - 나야 보다시피 잘 지내 - 그래

translation.en: Uh, this is, uh, Stevie, my girlfriend,
-Nice to meet you. -Nice to meet you, too.
translation.ko: - 이 친구는 애덤이야 - 반가워요 - 나도 반가워요 - 나랑 메릴랜드 예술대 동창이야

translation.en: Me and Adam went to MICA together.
translation.ko: - 나도 반가워요 - 나랑 메릴랜드 예술대 동창이야

translation.en: So what have you been up to, man? You with a gallery?
Are you a painter as well? Yeah, but not nearly as good as this guy.
translation.ko: - 애덤도 화가예요? - 네, 하지만 이 녀석만 못하죠

translation.en: -[Isaiah] Ah. -[Adam] He was a rock star -in school. -[chuckles]
translation.ko: 이 녀석 학창 시절에 인기 스타였거든요

translation.en: Oh, if you're in New York next month, I'm having my next solo show at the Sena,
translation.ko: 다음 달에 뉴욕 올 일 생기면 내 단독 전시회 보러 와

translation.en: spent six months in Rome getting ready for it.
Would love to have you at the opening.
That's great, man. Honestly, um, congrats.
I would kill to be in one of Chenai's shows, though.
translation.ko: 그나저나 나도 체나이 전시에 출품하고 싶어서 죽겠다

translation.en: [sighs] Loved your piece. Again, it was very nice to meet you.
translation.ko: 네 작품 정말 좋더라 모처럼 만나게 돼 반가웠어

translation.en: -Take it easy, man. -Nice to meet you.
I'm gonna talk to Chenai real quick.

translation.ko: - 와줘서 고마워 - 아니야, 그런 소리 하지 마

translation.en: I think you can do better.
translation.ko: 더 잘할 수도 있을 것 같은데요

translation.en: You called me your girlfriend in there.
translation.ko: 아까 거기서 나를 여자 친구로 소개하더라?

translation.en: Chenai doesn't think I'm ready for my solo show.
translation.ko: 체나이는 내가 아직 단독 전시를 열기에 부족하대

translation.en: She don't think I quite figured out what it is I wanna say.
translation.ko: 내가 뭘 표현하고 싶은 건지 정확히 모르는 거 같대

translation.en: Do you not think you have something to say?
translation.ko: 자기가 표현하고 싶은 게 뭔지 모르겠어?

translation.en: Then you have to show her.
Yeah. I'm gonna spend the night.
You think we're ready for that?
I mean, we spend nearly every night together.
translation.ko: 이미 거의 매일 밤 함께 보내고 있잖아

translation.en: You can work at the studio.
Let me guess, White boys you went to school with,
translation.ko: 너희 동창 중에 백인들은 이미 대다수가

translation.en: they already on their second, third solo?
translation.ko: 두 번째, 세 번째 단독 전시회도 열었겠지

translation.en: How much better are you than them?
Do the powers that be know that?
Motherfucker, they ain't gonna know it until you make them.
translation.ko: 그놈들은 네가 정상에 오르기 전까진 인정 안 해

translation.en: And when you do, just better be ready to create,
translation.ko: 그러니까 단단히 각오하고 작품을 만들어 내

translation.en: and I ain't talking that good shit neither, I'm talking that epic shit.
translation.ko: 좋은 작품 정도로는 안 돼 어마어마한 걸작이어야만 해

translation.en: Look, it don't matter that you're better than your classmates.
translation.ko: 너희 동창들보다 잘한다는 건 아무 의미 없어

translation.en: You can't be just better, right? You, you gotta be a fucking unicorn.
translation.ko: 그냥 더 잘하는 정도로는 안 돼 유니콘처럼 월등한 존재가 돼야지

translation.en: I just learned how to shapeshift.
[Stevie] Sometimes I wonder if getting a law degree is really necessary.
translation.ko: 가끔은 나한테 정말 법학 학위가 필요한 건가 싶어

translation.en: But, like, it just makes you 10 times more incredible at what you already do.
translation.ko: 하지만 그 학위를 취득하면 자기 신뢰도가 10배는 높아지잖아

translation.en: [Stevie] I just wanna be more like you sometimes.
[Stevie] Bold in your opinions, your work.
Sometimes I feel like my work isn't enough.
translation.ko: 난 가끔 내 작품이 부족하게 느껴져

translation.en: To express my ideas without having to explain them
translation.ko: 아무런 설명을 덧붙이지 않아도 내 생각이 잘 드러나면 좋겠어

translation.en: to anyone, not making any sort of statement
translation.ko: 아무런 설명을 덧붙이지 않아도 내 생각이 잘 드러나면 좋겠어 굳이 말로 표현하지 않아도
굳이 말로 표현하지 않아도 그냥 명료하게 보여주고 싶은데

translation.en: Do you feel like you can't do that? I don't know.
[Stevie] So, quickly, I didn't tell my parents

우리가 같이 사는 거 아직 부모님께는 말씀 안 드렸어

translation.en: -And my mom can be a little-- -Babe, I'm, I'm good.

translation.en: Mom, this is Isaiah. It's a pleasure to meet you, Mrs. Richmond.
translation.ko: - 엄마, 아이제이아예요 - 처음 뵙겠습니다, 리치먼드 부인

translation.en: You know where to find your father.
[Mr. Richmond] Hey, there she is, Stevie.

translation.ko: - 우리 딸, 스티비! - 아빠! 이리 와, 우리 딸

translation.en: -How are you? -Good. How are you doing?
Very nice to meet you, sir.

translation.ko: - 어디 출신인가? - 남동부 출신입니다 역시, 그래서 악력이 좋구먼

translation.en: This is a very nice house you have here.
Oh, you telling me. Got in when the getting was good,
got White folks confused as hell.
Now, I hope you bought something in Southeast
[Isaiah] Thank you for dinner, Mrs. Richmond.
translation.ko: 저녁 잘 먹었습니다 리치먼드 부인, 아주…

translation.en: It was, um, it was amazing.
translation.ko: 저녁 잘 먹었습니다 리치먼드 부인, 아주… 맛있었어요

translation.en: How did you two meet again?
You remember the one I told you about? Ah, yes.
translation.ko: - 제 얘기 기억 안 나세요? - 아, 맞다
스티비 말로는 화가라고 하던데? - 네 - 그게 대학 때 전공인가?

translation.en: Is that what you studied in school?
[Mrs. Richmond] Did you consider Howard? They have a wonderful art history program.
translation.ko: 하워드 대학교도 좋은데, 거기 미술사 프로그램도 훌륭하거든

translation.en: I wish the best to anyone who tries to make
a living out of a profession in the arts.
translation.ko: 예술로 생계를 꾸려야 하는 사람들 보면 말이지

translation.en: Not everything is about money, Mom.
[Mrs. Richmond] Of course everything isn't about money,
but in my experience especially at the embassy,
translation.ko: 하지만 내 경험상 특히 대사관에서는 말이다

translation.en: I love the fact that you want to help people
translation.ko: 남을 돕고 싶단 네 마음은 참 예뻐

translation.en: but there are cheaper ways to do that
If you're Black, you don't go to Georgetown Law
to work for an underfunded, non-profit, or second-string firm.
translation.ko: 자금난에 시달리는 비영리 단체나 이류 로펌에 들어갈 이유는 없잖아

translation.en: [Isaiah] I think it's great that Stevie wants to help people.
translation.ko: 저는 남을 돕고 싶다는 스티비 생각에 찬성합니다

translation.en: I mean, we need more lawyers like her looking out for us.
translation.ko: 우리에게는 스티비 같은 변호사가 더 많이 필요하니까요

translation.en: [Mrs. Richmond] So, how long have you two been seeing each other?
It must be hard to date while balancing law school.
translation.ko: 로스쿨 다니면서 데이트하기 쉽지 않았을 텐데

translation.en: no one can make time, that's why we don't want to waste it.
translation.ko: 바쁜데 따로 낼 시간이 어딨니? 그게 결국 다 시간 낭비야

translation.en: Actually, me and Isaiah are living together.
translation.ko: 실은 저랑 아이제이아 둘이 같이 살고 있어요

translation.en: -No. Baby, you should be-- -What do you even mean? --proud of this. Come on.
-What are you talking… -I'm proud of it. -I mean, he's your man. -Okay. I'm gonna let you be.
[laughs] But these injera tacos though, right? -Next level. -Uh-hmm.
translation.ko: 그나저나 이 타코는 아주 별세상 맛이네, 안 그래?

translation.en: Oh. Uh, so what are y'all getting into this weekend?
Uh, we are actually gonna go down to the Wharf,
go get some, like, fish and do an impromptu fish fry.
translation.ko: 부둣가 나가서 낚시도 하고 즉석 생선튀김도 해 먹을 건데 같이 가자

translation.en: -If y'all down? -Oh, we're so down. Uh-hmm.
translation.ko: 즉석 생선튀김도 해 먹을 건데 같이 가자 - 좋아 - 난…

translation.en: I have a piece to finish.
translation.ko: 작품 마무리해야 하거든 - 전시회 때문에 - 젠장
- 전시회 때문에 - 젠장 자기 일주일 내내 스튜디오에만 있었어

translation.en: you've been in the studio all week.
Yeah, I know. But I got a lot to finish.
translation.ko: 그래, 맞아, 할 일이 너무 많아서

translation.en: [Mecca] You were trying to break up a home? -I don't care. -Uh…
I have stolen many girlfriends before, okay? You a mess. You a mess.
translation.ko: - 나 여자 친구 빼돌리는 거 잘해 - 못 살아

translation.en: I can't with you though. [Sicily] I have no shame in my game.
translation.ko: - 너랑은 안 돼 - 난 전혀 부끄럽지 않아

translation.en: trying to get a solo show.
I mean, I barely see him.
I mean, girl, look, you know,
men can only focus on one thing at a time. -Uh-hmm. -Right?
translation.ko: 한 번에 하나밖에 못 하잖아 안 그래?

translation.en: You know, I just-- I just wish I knew how to help him.
translation.ko: 돕고 싶은데 내가 뭘 어떡해야 할지 모르겠어

translation.en: You took him to your house to meet your parents
translation.ko: 이미 너희 집에 살게 해줬고 너희 부모님께 인사도 드렸고
그 사람 무일푼인 것도 다 알잖아

translation.en: All he wants to do is to be able -to take care of you. -Yes.
translation.ko: 그 남자가 원하는 건 널 책임질 능력이겠지

translation.en: He doesn't want you to help him.
translation.ko: - 맞아 - 네 도움을 원하는 게 아니야

translation.en: -I mean, I… -[Mecca] No, you're right. -You're right. -I'm just saying. That's true.
translation.ko: - 그냥 그렇다는 말이야 - 아니, 맞는 소리야

translation.en: I wanna get the likeness as close as possible but,
you know, the thick paint kind of distorts the person's face.
translation.ko: 두꺼운 물감 탓에 인물의 표정이 왜곡됐어요

translation.en: End goal is to have it look kind of dramatic, I guess.
that's my perception of the person.
translation.ko: 그 인물에 대한 내 인식인 것 같아요

translation.en: God is gracious. God is good.
Let us thank you for this food. Amen. Thank you, Jesus.
translation.ko: 일용할 양식을 주셔서 감사합니다 아멘, 주님, 감사합니다

translation.en: Chenai's giving me a solo show.
translation.ko: 체나이가 내 단독 전시회를 열어 주겠대

translation.en: [Stevie] Oh, my God. That's amazing. -Yeah. -[Stevie] Congratulations.

translation.ko: 세상에, 대단하다! 축하해! 이게 웬일이야? - 고마워 - 이리 와

translation.en: Come over here. I'm so proud of you.
translation.ko: - 고마워 - 이리 와 자기 정말 자랑스럽다, 정말…

translation.en: I know I still got a lot of work do, so…
translation.ko: 아직 해야 할 일이 많지만 어쨌든…
- 리치먼드 양 - 클라크 박사님 자네가 졸업반 모의 법정 때 아주 잘했단 얘기 들었네, 축하해

translation.en: your capstone defense went very well, young lady. Congratulations. [laughs]
translation.ko: 자네가 졸업반 모의 법정 때 아주 잘했단 얘기 들었네, 축하해
감사합니다 자네에게 들어온 면접 요청이 여러 건이야

translation.en: so many interview invitations for you.
translation.ko: 자네에게 들어온 면접 요청이 여러 건이야

translation.en: Let's see. We got Schmidt Morgan here in DC.
We got New York. There's, uh, Pride & Randall.
translation.ko: 자, 이곳 DC의 '슈미트-모건' 그리고 뉴욕의 '프라이드-랜들' '제이컵스, 톰슨 & 리', 그리고…

translation.en: As well as Jacobs, Thompson, & Lee, and--
Watkins Skinner & Robertson in Chicago. Third most prominent firm in the country.
translation.ko: 국내 최고의 로펌, 시카고의 '왓킨스, 스키너 & 로버트슨'이네

translation.en: Um, [clears throat] a lot has changed since I applied.
translation.ko: 그런데 지금 제 상황이 지원했을 때랑 좀 달라져서요

translation.en: Okay. It's your decision to make,
translation.ko: 스티비, 잠깐, 그래, 알겠네 최종 결정은 자네의 몫이지만 향후 파트너 변호사가 되고 싶다면

translation.en: but if you really wanna be a partner one day,
translation.ko: 최종 결정은 자네의 몫이지만 향후 파트너 변호사가 되고 싶다면

translation.en: you don't turn down an opportunity like this.
translation.ko: 이렇게 좋은 기회는 놓치면 안 돼

translation.en: [Dr. Clark] It's totally up to you. Thank you.
[announcer] Please take your seats, the curtain is about to go up
translation.ko: 곧 막이 오를 예정이오니 착석해 주십시오

translation.en: on the Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater performance.
translation.ko: '앨빈 에일리 아메리칸 댄스 시어터'를 찾아주신 여러분께…

translation.en: ♪ Baby, did you hear the whistle blow? ♪
translation.ko: "그녀의 휴대폰" "부재중 전화" "아이제이아, 전화해 줘 무슨 일 있는 거 아니지?"

translation.en: I was in the zone and just…
I'm gonna go interview with Darlene Robertson's firm.
translation.ko: 달린 로버트슨 로펌에서 면접 볼 거야

translation.en: I just thought you were going with that firm you worked with over the summer.
translation.ko: 난 자기가 이번 여름에 일했던 로펌으로 갈 줄 알았는데

translation.en: Yeah. I figured it doesn't hurt to go.
translation.ko: 그래, 하지만 다른 데로 가도 나쁘지 않겠더라

translation.en: So how is that gonna work?
[Chenai] Isaiah, I want to introduce you to someone.
It's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for coming.
[Mrs. Maxwell] I'm so proud of you.
[Mr. Maxwell] You're doing it, son. Doing it.
-Gotta give it to you. -[Chenai] Ladies and gentlemen,
translation.ko: 해냈구나, 아들, 해냈어 수고 많았다 신사 숙녀 여러분 저는 체나이 헝궤입니다
신사 숙녀 여러분 저는 체나이 헝궤입니다

translation.en: and I want to thank you for coming out to this opening reception.
translation.ko: 이번 전시회를 축하하는 기념행사에 와주셔서 감사합니다

translation.en: And before we get started, I would really like to give
translation.ko: 시작에 앞서, 특별히 감사를 전하고 싶은 분이 계십니다

translation.en: a special thanks to Mr. Yusef Davis for…
translation.ko: 시작에 앞서, 특별히 감사를 전하고 싶은 분이 계십니다 유세프 데이비스 씨입니다

translation.en: For bringing this young talent to my attention.
translation.ko: 덕분에 제가 이 젊은 화가를 주목하게 됐습니다

translation.en: I have the distinct pleasure of presenting his first solo show.
translation.ko: 저는 이번 단독 전시를 선보이게 돼 진심으로 기쁩니다

translation.en: Many of you need no introduction,
but please allow me to introduce…
can't tell you how special this night is.
Take your time, Mo. You got it.
Truth is I wouldn't be here…
translation.ko: 지금 제가 이 자리에 있을 수 있는 건

translation.en: So don't let this get in your head and cause you to lose that.
translation.ko: 그러니까 이걸 받은 후에도 꾸준히 정진하도록 해요

translation.en: [Mrs. Richmond] You've become quite the collector.
He completed this one shortly after we met.
translation.ko: 만난 지 얼마 되지 않았을 때 완성한 거예요

translation.en: Stevie, I hope you're not expecting me to say
translation.ko: 스티비, 난 너한테 잘 생각해 보라는 말 따위 안 해

translation.en: think about it. There is nothing to think about.
translation.ko: 스티비, 난 너한테 잘 생각해 보라는 말 따위 안 해 생각해야 하는 게 하나도 없으니까 거기 합격했으면 무조건 가는 거야

translation.en: If you get the offer, you take it.
translation.ko: 생각해야 하는 게 하나도 없으니까 거기 합격했으면 무조건 가는 거야
생각해야 하는 게 하나도 없으니까 거기 합격했으면 무조건 가는 거야 엄마

translation.en: Trust your mother when I say you don't want to put anyone first
translation.ko: 제발 엄마 말 좀 들어 절대 너를 우선하지 않을 사람을

translation.en: who will never do the same for you, hmm?
translation.ko: 우선하는 헛된 짓 하지 말라는 얘기야

translation.en: You never told me how the interview in Chicago went.
I'm just not sure if it's right for me, you know?
translation.ko: 다만 내가 거길 가는 게 맞는지에 대한 확신이 안 서

translation.en: It is a pretty big deal, yeah.
It's an opportunity of a lifetime.
That's what you've been waiting for, right?
You can't just show up and expect things to be cool.
translation.ko: 불쑥 나타나서 아무 일도 없었단 듯 굴지 마

translation.en: What you mean just show up?
And when you are here, you're not here.
translation.ko: 어쩌다 몸은 여기 있어도 마음은 딴 데 가 있잖아

translation.en: I finally got a chance to break through.
And I've been working towards this my entire life. Years.
translation.ko: 내가 평생 노력해 온 일이 드디어 결실을 보려는 참인데

translation.en: You know, how fucking consuming that shit is, honestly?
translation.ko: 그림 그리는 게 얼마나 힘든지 알아?

translation.en: And what have you cared about that deeply, Stevie, for real?
How can you even ask me that? Look, I can't fuck this shit up.
translation.ko: - 그걸 지금 말이라고 해? - 난 이번엔 진짜 제대로 할 거야

translation.en: I ain't got peoples with money to fall back on.
The fuck you mean do I still want this? I'm here, right?
translation.ko: 너랑 이러고 싶긴 하냐니? 그럼 내가 왜 여기 있겠냐?

translation.en: I mean, come on, Stevie. You're the one with your own life plans, remember?
translation.ko: 이러지 마, 스티비, 너야말로 네 계획대로 살고 싶은 거잖아

translation.en: By the way, where the fuck do I fit in 'em? You're not the only one with dreams.
translation.ko: - 날 끼워줄 생각이 있긴 하냐? - 나한테는 꿈도 없는 거 같아?

translation.en: What's that supposed to mean, huh?
What, I don't support your dreams now, Stevie? Is that what you saying?
I'm taking the position in Chicago.
When were you gonna tell me, huh?
And why the fuck you ask for my opinion if you already
translation.ko: 이미 다 결정해 놓고 내 생각은 왜 물어본 거야?

translation.en: -made your mind up? -I'm telling you now.
translation.ko: 이미 다 결정해 놓고 내 생각은 왜 물어본 거야? - 지금 얘기하잖아 - 이게 얘기냐?

translation.en: The thing is I'm probably the last one to know, huh?
translation.ko: 나만 빼고 이미 다들 아는 얘기겠네

translation.en: [scoffs] I bet your mom is real fucking ecstatic. Get out.
translation.ko: - 너희 엄마 신나서 난리 나겠다 - 나가

translation.en: Oh, I can't wait for you to see it in person.
Now, we need to increase your output.
Now, if you can produce 20 or 30 paintings every year,
then we can secure placement in collections all around the world.
translation.ko: 전 세계에서 컬렉션 전시를 진행할 수 있거든요

translation.en: We need to start thinking international. -Isaiah, are you listening? -[mellow music playing]
translation.ko: 해외 시장도 염두에 둬야죠 아이제이아, 내 말 듣고 있어요?

translation.en: [Nick] You know, I was in the neighborhood, saw your truck, so I was like, "Let me stop in on young."
translation.ko: 이 동네 왔다가 마침 네 트럭이 보이길래 얼굴 보러 들렀어

translation.en: What's good, dawg? What's the word?
[Nick] Uh, I saw you in the city paper. Big shit. Oh.
translation.ko: 그렇지, 신문에서 네 기사 봤어 장난 아니더라

translation.en: [Nick] Yo, I'm really happy for you, man. I'm glad your art is paying off.
translation.ko: 네가 성공해서 내가 다 기쁘다 그림으로 돈을 다 벌고 말이야

translation.en: [Nick] Yo, why don't we get out of here, man?
Let's go hit U street, go get a couple of beers or something. We gotta catch up.
translation.ko: U 스트리트에 가서 맥주도 마시고 그간 이야기도 좀 하고

translation.en: My bad, man. You know how it is.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 내 상황 어떤지 잘 알잖아
안 돼, 내 상황 어떤지 잘 알잖아 그림에 열중하느라…

translation.en: [Isaiah] How about next weekend when I get back from Chicago?
translation.ko: 다음 주말은 어때? 내가 시카고에 갔다가 돌아오면

translation.en: You still ain't talked to her, huh?
Hey, so I see you're busy finishing up so I'ma let you get to it.
translation.ko: 작업하느라 바쁜 거 같은데 나는 이만 가볼게

translation.en: [woman] I saw Chocolate City in New York and it blew my mind.
Oh, beautiful work. [Isaiah] Thank you. Thank you very much.
Thank you guys for coming. Enjoy yourselves.
Nice to meet you. Isaiah. Thank you.
-Nice to meet you. -[Stevie] Yeah. Yeah. I'm good. Just, um…

translation.ko: - 잘 있었어? - 그럼, 나도 잘 지내지
- 잘 있었어? - 그럼, 나도 잘 지내지 최고야

translation.en: Ahmad, this is, um, Isaiah Maxwell.
How do you two know each other?
Enjoy the rest of the show, um, Stevie.
It was really good to see you.
It was really good to see you.
Look, uh, my second solo show is in DC in a few weeks
translation.ko: 몇 주 후에 DC에서 내 두 번째 단독 전시회가 열려

translation.en: and I'd really love-- really love for you to be there.
translation.ko: 네가 와주면 정말 기쁠 것 같아

translation.en: There's something I want you to see.
translation.ko: 너한테 보여 주고 싶은 게 있거든

translation.en: You know, I was hoping maybe we could, uh, you know, catch up, talk,
translation.ko: 혹시 시간 되면 같이 얘기도 좀 하고

translation.en: Yeah, so, you know, let me know.
translation.ko: 그래, 올 수 있는지 없는지 알려줘

translation.en: Are you saying you wish I didn't? [Isaiah] I'm saying I'm happy you did.
translation.ko: - 오지 말지 그랬냐는 거야? - 와줘서 기쁘다는 말이야

translation.en: -It's good to see you. -It's good to see you too.
I read your interview. -In The New York Times. -[chuckles]
I'm no good at all that. [laughs]
translation.ko: 나 그런 거 잘 못 하잖아

translation.en: [Stevie] The role of a Black artist is the same as a Black teacher
translation.ko: '흑인 화가의 역할은 흑인 교사의 역할과 비슷하다'

translation.en: -[Isaiah] It's not funny. -No. It was a great interview.
translation.ko: - 하나도 안 웃겨 - 아니야, 멋진 인터뷰였어

translation.en: Can I ask you something else?
translation.ko: 그럼 다른 거 하나 물어봐도 돼?

translation.en: You know I would if I could.

translation.ko: 저는… 그 그림은 벽면 전체에 그것만 따로 걸었으면 해요

translation.en: to be on a wall by itself, actually.
translation.ko: 그 그림은 벽면 전체에 그것만 따로 걸었으면 해요

translation.en: Yeah. I mean, maybe we can mount it on the opposite wall. Yeah.
translation.ko: 네, 반대쪽 벽으로 옮겨 걸어도 되죠, 그건…

translation.en: Where are you going? I thought we were gonna spend the day together?
translation.ko: 어디 가려고? 오늘은 나랑 같이 있을 줄 알았는데

translation.en: I'm almost done so just give me a second.
translation.ko: 거의 다 됐어, 잠깐만 기다려 줘

translation.en: I gotta go. Come on, Stevie. You can't just wait a minute?
translation.ko: - 이만 가볼게 - 왜 그래, 스티비? 잠깐이면 돼

translation.en: We just had an amazing night together you're just gonna leave like that?
translation.ko: 어젯밤에 우리 둘이 정말 좋았잖아 그런데 이렇게 가 버리겠다고?

translation.en: Tell me you don't still feel something.
Of course, I still feel something. [Isaiah] Okay.
-It's not gonna go away. -[Isaiah] Okay. Then what's the problem?
translation.ko: - 쉽게 사라질 마음이 아니잖아 - 그러면 대체 뭐가 문제야?

translation.en: [Stevie] If you had asked me to stay, I never would have left.
translation.ko: 나한테 가지 말라고 했으면 난 아무 데도 안 갔을 거야!

translation.en: I'm so in love with you,
I'm so in love with you, okay?
[Mrs. Richmond] Are you going to tell me what's going on?
translation.ko: 무슨 일인지 얘기 안 할 거니?

translation.en: What do you mean? Well, let's see.
You show up out of the blue.
It's not a holiday or my birthday.
-[chuckles] -You never just pop up. That's not your style.
translation.ko: 넌 절대 갑자기 들이닥치지 않아 전혀 그런 성격이 아니잖니

translation.en: Sometimes people are only in our lives for a season.
translation.ko: 인생에는 가끔 한 철만 머물다 가는 사람들이 있어

translation.en: to appreciate that time we had and what it taught us.
translation.ko: 그때 얻은 교훈을 소중히 여기는 법을 배워야지

translation.en: Once upon a time, before your father,
I was seeing a young man.
But it became very clear he wasn't ready for me,
translation.ko: 하지만 그 사람은 전혀 나와 함께할 준비가 돼 있지 않았어
그래서 나는… 그를 기다릴지 떠나갈지 결정해야 했단다

translation.en: if I was going to wait for him or move on.
I don't think I'll ever forget that love I felt.
translation.ko: 그때 함께 나눈 사랑은 아마 영원히 잊지 못할 거야

translation.en: And if I could do it over again, I would still fall in love.
translation.ko: 그 시간으로 되돌아간다 해도 난 여전히 그 사람을 사랑할 거야

translation.en: No one can take it away from you.
translation.ko: 그 마음은 아무도 빼앗을 수 없지

translation.en: -[Stevie] I'm so happy for you. -Thank you.
You look wonderful. You look wonderful, as always.
I wanna introduce you to someone please.
translation.ko: 소개할 사람이 있어요 나랑 같이 가요
소개할 사람이 있어요 나랑 같이 가요 - 금방 올게 - 그래
